title: Retrieve a Self Assessment Tax Calculation
description: This endpoint allows the developer to retrieve all the tax calculation data for a given NINO and Calculation ID.

chargeableEventGainsIncome.description: Object containing information about chargeable event gains income in the retrieved tax calculation.

totalOfAllGains.description: Total gains for chargeable event gains income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99. No decimals.

totalGainsWithTaxPaid.description: Total gains with tax paid for chargeable event gains income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99. No decimals.

gainsWithTaxPaidDetail.description: Array detailing gains with tax paid.

type.description: The type of gains with tax paid.

customerReference.description: A reference unique to the customer.

gainAmount.description: Gain amount for gains with tax paid. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

yearsHeld.description: Years held. This value must be between 0 and 99. No decimals.

yearsHeldSinceLastGain.description: Years held since last gain. This value must be between 0 and 99. No decimals.

totalGainsWithNoTaxPaidAndVoidedIsa.description: Total of gains with no tax paid and voided ISA. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

gainsWithNoTaxPaidAndVoidedIsaDetail.description: Array detailing gains with no tax paid and voided Isa.

type.description: The type of gains with no tax paid and voided ISA.

gainAmount.description: Gain amount for gains with no tax paid and voided ISA. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

yearsHeld.description: Years held. This value must be between 0 and 99. No decimals.

yearsHeldSinceLastGain.description: Years held since last gain. This value must be between 0 and 99. No decimals.

voidedIsaTaxPaid.description: Voided ISA tax paid amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalForeignGainsOnLifePoliciesTaxPaid.description: Total of foreign gains on life policies with no tax paid. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.
